title: Rep. Gowdy urges to look more at FL shooter than the "instrumentality"
text:
Rep. Gowdy urges to look more at FL shooter than the "instrumentality" 9:53pm EST - 01:30 
Rep. Trey Gowdy said   that he ''applauded'' the Florida students that were pushing for stricter gun laws, but said it would be a ''disservice'' if they only looked at the ''instrumentality'' and not the shooter.   
Rep. Trey Gowdy said   that he "applauded" the Florida students that were pushing for stricter gun laws, but said it would be a "disservice" if they only looked at the "instrumentality" and not the shooter.  //reut.rs/2EMvK8p
